message.content:
cs.DC, cs.NI, cs.SE, cs.DL, cs.PL 

The paper discusses the evaluation of the EDG middleware and testbed environment for the purpose of porting experiment software and testing basic functionality and performance. This involves areas such as job submission, data management, mass storage handling, information systems, and monitoring, which are all related to distributed computing (cs.DC) and network infrastructure (cs.NI). The paper also mentions issues related to software development (cs.SE), remote debugging (cs.PL), and scaling problems (cs.DL).
